content.note: Banjo 2 Release is a major release requires running soajs migrator and here are the steps:
content.footer: if you need help please contact soajs support, we are looking forward to guide with this update.

content: 2- backup the file config.js from the existing soajs.installer/etc/config.js
4- unzip the new installer and copy it to the same location
5- copy the backed up config.js into soajs.installer/etc/
2- backup the folder startup from the existing soajs.installer/include/soajs-remote/data/startup
3- backup the file custom.js from the existing soajs.installer/include/soajs-remote/data/custom.js
5- unzip the new installer and copy it to the same location
6- copy the backed up custom.js file and startup folder into soajs.installer/include/soajs-remote/data/
Redeploy SOASJ services from the console for dashboard environment
restart SOASJ services from the console for dashboard environment

repos.name: soajs
features: Added new controller routes to return loaded registry
Provided ability to add optional API that returns the swagger contract of a service
Provided support to invoke the swagger API publicly without the need to provide a key or access token
Updated controller middleware to append awareness information about environment controllers in injected headers
Updated service middleware to read awareness from injected body when configured to
Added support in controller to detect versioning either as /serviceName:Version/API or as /serviceName/vVersion/API
Added support to create custom maintenance routes for services
SOAJS services receive tenant configuration at runtime from controller
SOAJS services receive URAC information at runtime from controller
SOAJS controller is now responsible for all security checks
Updated SOAJS architecture to support microservices created in other languages
bugFixes: Updated code coverage
Fix reported issue when proxying calls between environments to non multitenant services
Minor fix in API detection for swagger files
Fixed issue with persisting sessions
Fixed issue with proxy request to remote environments
Fixed issue with detecting ACL at urac level
enhancedTests: Moved caching registry to soajs.core.modules
Updated dependency list
Removed cluster logs when deploying a service
Replaced bcrypt with bcryptjs
SOAJS modules and libs are now required via SOAJS core

features: Created new model for registry: API
Added support to create & manage resources
Added support to plug and unplug resources
Added support to share resources in multiple or all environments
enhancedTests: Moved auto reload registry to soajs.core/registry module
Replaced bcrypt with bcryptjs
General performance issue in caching registry

Revamped redeploy service function to support rebuilding from catalog and added extra functionalities
enhancedTests: Updates in dependencies and dev dependencies

bugFixes: Bug fix in getUrac, was not returning user config when needed.

repos.name: soajs.dashboard
bugFixes: Fixed a minor bug in Grid UI filtering functionality.
Fixed a minor bug when updating application configuration (no longer replies with empty object) causing boxes to turn grey if empty.
features: Added the ability to select a dashboard package when creating a tenant.
Creating a tenant with a dashboard package automatically creates an application, key, and external key and adds the external key to the list of dashboard tenant keys.
Creating an external key while using a locked package automatically adds it to the list of dashboard tenant keys if the tenant doesn’t have one already.
Merged tenants listing and dashboard tenant keys listing into one section.
Tenants with dashboard access now marked with a star. Listing external keys now shows which key is used to access dashboard.
Deleting an external key with dashboard access automatically removes it from the list of dashboard tenant keys.
Deleting a tenant, application, or key that contains an external key with dashboard access automatically removes it from the list of dashboard tenant keys.
Operator is no longer allowed to delete tenant/application/key/external_key/product/package he/she is currently logged in with.
Adding a tenant now requires a mandatory new input: tenant's administrator email address.
Added ability to expand/collapse a tenant box in tenant listing for a better user experience.
Dashboard product now marked with green borders and displayed at the top of product listing.
Applications with dashboard access now marked with a star in Settings section. Listing external keys now shows which key is used to access dashboard.
Tenants are now categorized and displayed by role. Two roles are currently displayed: Product and Client.
Users can add a tag to a tenant for better tenant organization.
Tenant Search feature included in Multi-tenancy section (allows search by tenant name, code, and tag).
Tenant code is no longer added by user. It gets automatically generated on Add Tenant.
If adding an admin user or group for a new tenant fails, new tenant won't be added.
Running daemons are now listed in Hosts section with the services listing.
enhancedTests: Updated test cases to meet the newly introduced features.

repos.name: soajs.GCS
features: Ability to deploy multiple services using the same module code but with different names and versions.
Supports ADD - EDIT - GET - DELETE - LIST APIs to add & manage data in static and multitenant databases.
Supports Uploading and Streaming Media Files into and out of GridFS
Ability to manage data across different environments
Can have multiple nodes for the same service for load distribution
Supports Multiple versions for both Service & Data schemas
